text: Morning. Watching the video and having questions. So, native fabric builds are a recent introduction in v1.0? I built natively on Ubuntu 16.04 on Z more than a month ago I guess. All the process (apart from different targets and COP with its own repository) seemed to me quite similar to native build 0.6. Am I missing something?

<@U1GPHH6PQ> since vagrant is to virtualize a linux environment, a Ubuntu based build environment would definitely be much easier to achieve outside of vagrant. it was much harder to build in mac or windows and is now possible with the recent work (it’s been possible for more than a month I believe)
